divs: Sighting Detailsit was up in the sky and came towards me and the the lights turned off and went backwards,and to the left, went across the marshlands and over south san francisco bay,it loward towards the water and hovard. no sound at all. ten minuets later I seen the same object with lights flashing again, and took off north east across the bay. 1.at the sunnyvale smart station(city dump) I was getting ready to work on my loader to load trucks. 2.I looked up in the sky and saw lights.3.something I never seen before.4.It came toward me and went back and to the left and across the bay.5. I was with co workers and we we were all in awe and in semi shocked,like what the f..k was that?6.it went across the bay and dissapeared. I have photos but only on my verizon cell phone with documented time, if you have a picture phone I can send to you.
trends: There have been 106 other sightings in San Jose
There were no other sightings in San Jose on or around March 9th 2007
Summary: circular with red and white lights rotating
